# IORecursiveLockFree | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ DriverKit ](/documentation/driverkit)

- [ IORecursiveLockFree ](/documentation/driverkit/iorecursivelockfree)

-  IORecursiveLockFree 

Function# IORecursiveLockFree

DriverKitiOSiPadOSmacOS

```
void IORecursiveLockFree(struct IORecursiveLock * lock);
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/driverkit/iorecursivelockfree#parameters)

`lock`Pointer to the allocated lock.

## [Discussion](/documentation/driverkit/iorecursivelockfree#discussion)

Frees a recursive lock.

Frees a lock allocated with IORecursiveLockAlloc. Lock should be unlocked with no waiters.
